page.title: 11BERRY HILL SCHOOL LIFE.
page.content: At school we use a pen and pencil and our school teaches 9 to 13 year old children. The First Year spends more time on Integrated Studies than any other lesson.At school we use computers,tape recorders,televisions and a video. Most pupils would prefer to wear what they want rather than the school uniform.Girls think we need to write with biros and boys ink pens.At school lots of teachers get fed up of their classes occasionally. More people walk to school than go by other forms of transport.The caretaker looks after the school with the help of cleaners.The school was built in 1967 and is built of concrete,brick and wood.
